title: Senior Associate, Transaction Advisory Services
description:
**Job Description:** **Day-to-day responsibilities:**

* Examining historical trends and discussing significant fluctuations and non-recurring items between periods
* Assisting in identifying issues for purchase price reductions, deal restructuring, or deal termination
* Identifying post-acquisition steps to achieve anticipated earnings/cash flow improvements
* Assisting clients in identifying pre and post-acquisition transaction issues
* Identifying new business opportunities and developing lon...

title: Equipment Operator-Roller
description:
**What you can expect:**

* $26.00/hour or more depending on experience, with a $10.00/hour shift differential
* Per Diem and travel time
* Annual increase potential
* OT after 8
* Paid Time Off
* $1,000 Referral Bonuses - unlimited

**What you will do:**

* Operate a Roller
* Run other paving equipment
* Perform construction tasks such as shoveling, raking material, assisting truck driver with backing and dumping materials
* Work on various construction projects

title: Class A CDL Equipment Operator HAZMAT Emergency Response Driver
description:
**Job Description:**

* Valid Class A CDL License required with tanker \& hazmat endorsements, unrestricted (able to drive manual)
* Monday through Friday schedule, average start time 6 am
* Typically, an 8-10 hour day, overtime after 40 hrs.
* On-call availability and ability for some travel required

* Health and Safety is our #1 priority and we live it 3-6-5!
* Focus on maintaining sustainability and cleaning the Earth
* Pay range $26-29 per hour
* Comprehensive health benefits coverage after...

title: On-Site Equipment Specialist
location: East Providence, Rhode Island, United States
description:
* Expertly install and review our automatic equipment and automation systems at various customer sites.
* Conduct thorough inspections of equipment installations to maintain compliance with our rigorous standards.
* Deliver prompt service assistance, employing a range of technical equipment like electrical meters and gauging tools.
* Offer remote technical assistance through calls and emails, addressing client concerns swiftly.

description:

description:
